82801.title: The Gates of the Castle
82801.description:
Swung wide open the gates of this castle stand nearly 20 feet tall.
Made of solid wood, they are polished to perfection.  A large crossbeam
sits suspended from the rampart above, ready to be lowered into place
should the gates be closed.  The halls of the castle can be seen to
the North.  The marble floors shine on either side of the blue carpet
that runs down the center of the walkway.  A large shield engraved
with a blue cross hangs on the front of both gates.  Directly over head
a blue cross sits in a prominent position over the gates.

82802.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82802.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination.  A
masterfully crafted tower shield is mounted on the Northern wall.
Below it a sign can be seen with the simple word of "Courage" engraved
upon it.

82803.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82803.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination.  Upon
the eastern wall a beautiful tapestry hangs.  It depecits a knight in
shing armor, standing beside a beautiful white steed.  The knight is
handing food to a small child and what would appear to be his mother.
A set of stairs lead up from the corner of the room into a turret above.

82804.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82804.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination.  Upon
the Western wall a beautiful tapestry hangs.  It depicts a group of
knights chasing an ancient red dragon out of a partially burning hamlet.
A set of stairs lead up from the corner of the room into a turret above.

82805.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82805.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination. This
room bears a much different smell than the rest of the castle.  Just
to the East the stables can be seen.

82806.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82806.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination.  Upon
the Eastern wall a beautiful tapestry hangs.  The scene of a great feast
is shown here.  Knights, squires, and the villagers all taking part in
a merry celebration. A set of stairs lead up from the corner of the room
into a turret above.

82807.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82807.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination. A
large frame for a portrait hangs along the Eastern wall, though no
portrait currently fills the space.  To the west a room looks to be
filled with things that would be useful in training squires and
knights alike.

82808.title: Within the Halls of Valor
82808.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination.  Upon
the Western wall a beautiful tapestry hangs.  A squire bravely is
dragging an injured knight from the battlefield, while risking his own
life in the process.   A set of stairs lead up from the corner of the room
into a turret above.

82809.title: Before the Altar
82809.description:
The halls of the castle are simple yet elegant.  A finely woven blue
carpet runs down the middle of the walkway.  Small crosses in a darker
hue of blue are sewn into the carpet at equal intervals.  Beautiful
white marble tile can be seen to either side of the carpet.  Torches
are lit along the hallway giving off a flickering illumination. To the
South, a place of reverance can be seen.  An altar sits dedicated to
the tenants of Valor, Courage, and Honor.  In this room, the knights
can prepare themselves to go before the altar to meditate.  A fountain
flows here, quenching their thirst, and also allowing them to properly
wash themselves before going into the holy room to the South.

82810.title: The Altar of Valor, Honor and Courage
82810.description:
A large white marble altar sits in a prominent place in this room.  It
appears to be carved of one single piece of marble with intricate scroll
designs.  A strip of royal blue cloth runs across the length of the altar,
and upon the cloth many crosses are embroidered.  Around the room more
torches hang than through the rest of the castle.  Light sparkles in this
room and illuminates it as if you were standing under the noonday sun.
Tapestries line the walls, depicting ancient knights serving the kingdoms
of the land as all knights should.

82811.title: The Room of Preparation
82811.description:
In many ways this room looks like the rest of the castle, blue hues
decorate the floors and walls.  Torches hang on the wall giving off
enough light to see by easily.  This room however is setup to help
train young squires and even the knights in their continued training.
Racks of weapons sit along the wall, and a knight stands in the room
ready to spar with all who wish to learn.  A cot sits along the wall
to give those training a comfortable place to rest.

82812.title: The stables
82812.description:
In the stables an air of animal musk hangs heavily.  Straw covers
much of the floor here.  Channels in the floor are used to wash away
the muck and grime that comes from the steeds themselves.  Along the
walls, various tools can be seen for shoeing horses.  Feed buckets
sit nicely along one wall.  Another wall holds many harness, bit, and
bridle.  A stack of beautiful blue cloth sits in one corner, that is
used to drape over the steeds.

82813.title: The Northeast Turret
82813.description:
The turret is simple in adornment, and meant to serve a specific purpose.
it grants a view of the grounds around the castle, so that intruders can
be watched for.  This turret overlooks the forests to the North, while also
granting a partial view of the marketplace of Lacunae.  The fine marble of
the rest of the place is not to be found here.  Only the soft blue carpets
still look like the rest.  The stairs lead back down to the castle proper,
and are also covered in the fine blue carpetting.

82814.title: The Northwest Turret
82814.description:
The turret is simple in adornment, and meant to serve a specific purpose.
it grants a view of the grounds around the castle, so that intruders can
be watched for.  This turret overlooks the forests to the North, as well
as the path to the Grey Havens to the West.  The fine marble of the rest
of the place is not to be found here.  Only the soft blue carpets still
look like the rest.  The stairs lead back down to the castle proper,
and are also covered in the fine blue carpetting.

82815.title: The Southwest Turret
82815.description:
The turret is simple in adornment, and meant to serve a specific purpose.
it grants a view of the grounds around the castle, so that intruders can
be watched for.  This turret overlooks the path to the Grey havens, as
well as providing a slightly blocked view of the halflings den to the
Southwest.  It also provides a fine view of the path leading right up
to the castle itself.  The fine marble of the rest of the place is not to
be found here.  Only the soft blue carpets still look like the rest.  The
stairs lead back down to the castle proper, and are also covered in the
fine blue carpetting.

82816.title: The Southeast Turret
82816.description:
The turret is simple in adornment, and meant to serve a specific purpose.
it grants a view of the grounds around the castle, so that intruders can
be watched for.  This turrent grants a fine view of the marketplace of
Lacunae.  And also allows for the castle to have a perfect view of the
path leading to the walls as well. The fine marble of the rest of the
place is not to be found here.  Only the soft blue carpets still look
like the rest.  The stairs lead back down to the castle proper, and
are also covered in the fine blue carpetting.
